privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: The CCEABT places paramount importance on the protection of your personal data and your privacy.

privacy_policy.section_1_li_3: Partner portal (Technical reports, Google Drive links)
privacy_policy.section_2_text: Your information is used exclusively to:
